title: Fitness Vlogger, Katie, Chooses Pasture Raised Organic Eggs from Chino Valley Ranchers
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Katie Yovin, a fitness and health video blogger, recently shared a video on why she only chooses Pasture-Raised Organic eggs from Chino Valley Ranchers. The video, titled “What I Eat in a Day” was posted on her YouTube channel along with a recipe on her Instagram page, where she has more than 62,000 followers.

Chino Valley Ranchers, a California-based egg producer and distributor, has been providing organic eggs to consumers for over 30 years. “We’ve been offering organic eggs to our customers long before the current start of the USDA Organic program,” said Chris Nichols, co-owner of Chino Valley Ranchers. “Today, we make our own organic feed, and operate Southern California’s only organic feed mill for poultry.”

In her video, Yovin chronicles some of her healthy eating habits. For breakfast, she highlights one of her favorite simple and healthy meals: two Pasture Raised Organic eggs from Chino Valley Ranchers on sourdough toast. Yovin continues to talk about her goals to eat as many organically-sourced foods as possible, which is why Chino Valley Ranchers is her favorite egg supplier. “They’re organic. They’re grade A. They’re cage-free. It’s literally everything I look for when I buy eggs,” Yovin says. “I just really believe in this company.”

As a certified personal trainer and dedicated fitness guru, Yovin regularly posts motivational and informational vlogs and pictures to her social media platforms. She happily shares dietary ideas, fitness plans and inspirational messages to encourage her followers to live a healthier lifestyle. Watch Yovin’s “What I Eat in a Day” YouTube video and follow the rest of her health journey on her Instagram page (@katieyovin).

To learn more about Chino Valley Ranchers and their Pasture Raised Organic eggs, call (800) 354-4503.
